channel.title: Template Rendering :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: While skilled programmers may have chafed at the restrictions imposed by server pages, there was one aspect that came to be greatly valued - the ability to embed script directly in HTML, and have it evaluated and concatenated into the HTML text. Template Libraries This is where template libraries come in. A template library allows you to write your HTML content as HTML in a separate file with a special syntax to inject dynamic programming script.
